text:
Cambridge, UK – Genestack – http://genestack.com

We're looking for experienced developers to help work on our cloud-based genomics operating system. There are challenges to suit all tastes -- Unix coding, pure Java, Python, R, bioinformatics/genomics, cloud computing, UI work/dataviz, etc.

Our office is in the very centre of Cambridge, walking distance to everywhere. We're a privately held startup, just launched our platform, exciting times ahead!

Get in touch with me, Misha Kapushesky at misha@genestack.com if you'd like to chat.
